import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Inventario } from '../inventario'; @Component({ selector: 'app-editar-inventario', templateUrl: './editar-inventario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./editar-inventario.component.css'] }) export class EditarInventarioComponent { inventario : Inventario = new Inventario() }
